title: I don't know how I feel about this one guys.
body:
this re-work seems a little bad. like, I cant even stack these new things in the jungle as nasus- that makes no sense. 
the ward thing is meh- like why do that. you have given such a big boost to champs that were already hard to deal with. {{champion:67}} {{champion:84}} 
these new masteries are NOT user friendly. this new shield shit is kinda busted- like, do you guys not give a shit anymore?
thanks for distracting me from the fact the states voted trump by making lol even more of a frustration.
